snippet: Travis Zajac, in his second comeback from an Achilles’ tendon injury this season, is the Devils’ top-line center again.
lead_paragraph: Travis Zajac, in his second comeback from an Achilles’ tendon injury this season, is the Devils’ top-line center again.

headline.seo: Devils’ Top Line Regains Important Piece in Travis Zajac
headline.main: Devils’ Top Line Regains an Important Piece
headline.print_headline: Devils’ Top Line Regains an Important Piece
